if Statement.Usage: Used for conditional execution of code.

else Statement.Usage: Used to specify code to execute when the condition is false.

while Loop.Usage: Executes a block of code while a condition is true.

for Loop.Usage: Used for iterating over a range of values.

do-while Loop.Usage: Executes a block of code at least once and then continues while a condition is true.

break.Usage: Used to exit a loop prematurely.

continue.Usage: Skips the current iteration of a loop and continues with the next iteration.
